qa-2026-02-10-e2e-major-failure-rate.title: Full E2E Chromium run fails in most suites
qa-2026-02-10-e2e-major-failure-rate.details: Baseline full run still shows broad instability (28/35 failed). Partial focused fixes landed, but a fresh full-suite validation after current test hardening is still pending.

qa-2026-02-10-local-test-services-health.title: Locally spawned E2E services show intermittent internal health read timeouts
qa-2026-02-10-local-test-services-health.details: During focused reruns, backend logs repeatedly show read timeouts for inter-service /health checks (especially 5501/5502). This likely contributes to cross-suite flakiness and needs stabilization or isolated execution mode.

qa-2026-02-10-settings-mfa-ui-assertions.title: MFA setup UI does not consistently transition into token-entry state
qa-2026-02-10-settings-mfa-ui-assertions.details: auth-mfa.spec.ts still fails after hardening: after /mfa/setup response, token input `input[placeholder=000000]` is often not rendered. Needs root-cause in MFA setup component/data contract and robust assertion strategy.

qa-2026-02-10-e2e-hub-healthcheck-timeou.title: waitForHub setup timeout mitigated but still noisy
qa-2026-02-10-e2e-hub-healthcheck-timeou.details: waitForHub was bounded and made non-fatal in tests/utils.ts, eliminating prior hard setup aborts in focused auth runs. Remaining warning logs show occasional hub readiness lag and should be cleaned up for deterministic startup.

qa-2026-02-10-audit-logs-fixture-asserti.title: Audit logs E2E does not render expected seeded rows
qa-2026-02-10-audit-logs-fixture-asserti.details: audit-logs.spec.ts fails on missing `user-0`/`user-1` rows. Needs deterministic fixture setup and explicit readiness check before row assertions.

qa-2026-02-10-auth-password-flow-stabili.title: Password-change E2E flow remains brittle
qa-2026-02-10-auth-password-flow-stabili.details: auth-password.spec.ts previously failed on settings/page readiness and missing expected text. Needs same hardening pattern as auth core tests (API-backed waits, resilient selectors, reduced dependency on networkidle).

qa-2026-02-10-llm-suite-contract.title: LLM suites need clear separation of mock and live-provider paths
qa-2026-02-10-llm-suite-contract.details: llm-config, llm-generate, and templates-ai still fail in full run while live-LM tests are skipped. Separate deterministic mock assertions from explicit live-provider jobs.

qa-2026-02-10-teams-templates-api-e2e.title: Teams and templates API E2E flows fail end-to-end
qa-2026-02-10-teams-templates-api-e2e.details: team-types-roles, teams CRUD, and templates CRUD suites fail consistently in full run. Stabilize API fixture isolation and post-login readiness checks.

qa-2026-02-10-e2e-log-noise-404-endpoint.title: Reduce recurring 404 noise for /events and /stats/history
qa-2026-02-10-e2e-log-noise-404-endpoint.details: Frequent 404s are mostly non-blocking but hide actionable failures in logs. Align polling endpoints or add explicit test-mode no-op handlers.

qa-2026-02-10-e2e-bootstrap-performance.title: E2E global setup spends time on repeated startup work
qa-2026-02-10-e2e-bootstrap-performance.details: Using ANANTA_SKIP_PIP=1 improves loop speed, but startup remains expensive due repeated local service bootstrapping. Add cached/keep-alive local mode for iterative runs.

qa-2026-02-10-overcommit-warning.title: Redis vm.overcommit_memory host warning
qa-2026-02-10-overcommit-warning.details: Redis warns about vm.overcommit_memory=0. Non-blocking for tests, but host tuning should be added to setup docs/scripts.
